title: R-implementation of MCC optimization
description: Matthews correlation coefficientWiki: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matthews_correlation_coefficient Author: Vopani R-implementation of CPMP's fast mcc optimization originally from Anokas mcc optimization code. It is slower than the Python implementation, maybe someone can optimize this further, before trying to use it in xgboost or elsewhere.
